name: Huajin Mingzhu Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coking Coal Energy Group Co Ltd
Shanxi Huajin Mingzhu Coal Industry Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E5%8D%8E%E6%99%8B%E6%98%8E%E7%8F%A0%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E8%B4%A3%E4%BB%BB%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Huajin Mingzhu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Wangjiahe Village, Tunli Town, Jixian County, Linfen City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Huajin Mingzhu Coal Industry Company
owners: Shanxi Coking Coal Energy Group Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Huajin Mingzhu Coal Industry Company, which is owned by Huajin Coking Coal Co Ltd and Shanxi Coking Coal Energy Group Co Ltd.
